description: Only send Discord notifications on errors or new member additions
steps: Modify CronService.notifySuccess to check if added > 0 or errors > 0 before sending
Skip notification when added=0 AND errors=0 (no-op sync)
Add logging when notification is skipped for transparency
Update tests to verify conditional notification behavior

description: Skip sync when Google Sheet data is unchanged (in-memory hash comparison)
steps: Create a hash utility to compute SHA-256 of sorted sheet rows
Add module-level variable in SyncService to store last sheet hash
After fetching rows, compute hash and compare with stored hash
If hash matches, log 'No changes detected' and return early with zero counts
If hash differs, proceed with sync and update stored hash
Add tests for hash computation and change detection logic

description: Support separate First Name and Last Name columns via configurable env vars
steps: Add COLUMN_FIRST_NAME and COLUMN_LAST_NAME to AppConfig with empty string defaults
Update GoogleSheetsService.parseUserContacts to detect first/last name columns
If COLUMN_FIRST_NAME is set, combine first + last name (handle missing last name)
Fall back to single COLUMN_NAME if first/last not configured
Add tests for name combination logic and edge cases (missing last name, whitespace)

description: Handle edge cases in name parsing (whitespace, empty last name)
steps: Trim whitespace from first and last names before combining
If last name is empty, use first name only (no trailing space)
If first name is empty but last name exists, use last name only
Ensure combined name passes NonEmptyTrimmedString validation
Add unit tests for all edge cases
notes: Implemented as part of name-001 via combineName function
